structure.unit: Money And Registration, Issuance And Redemption Of Bonds And Other Securities, Facsimile Signatures

law.catch_line: Certification Of Protest By Notary; Prima Facie Evidence
law.text: The protest of a bill of exchange, promissory note or order for the payment of money certified by a notary public under his hand and official seal shall be prima facie evidence of the facts stated in such protest, and of the giving of notice to the drawer or endorser.
